item.description:
An afternoon at the exclusive Brae Burn Country Club!!

Please join us for an afternoon soiree of hearty hors d'ouevres, cocktails, great conversation and light music at the beautiful and lovely Brae Burn Country Club in Newton.

Brae Burn is known for its' famous golf course. It was initially developed in the late 1700's and redesigned by legendary course architect Donald Ross in the early 1800's. It remains a classic championship course today.

This is a great venue for an afternoon for friends old and new.

This event is for Sitz members and their invited guests. It is also open to outside guests It is a tradition that the Sitzundjibers Social Club has kept ongoing for many years.

Let's all pitch in to introduce the best of our network to the best of Sitz! This is an opportunity to introduce New Faces to Sitzunjibers! So, spread the word to all your friends, neighbors, co-workers, former girl friends & boyfriends....etc.

The afternoon includes wonderful hors d'ouevres, a cash bar, stimulating conversation, music (piano by Bonnie MacLeod) and meeting many new faces.

There is a charge of $30.00. RSVP required by Nov 1st

Paypal is NOT accepted for this event.
item.name: An Afternoon Delight at the Brae Burn Country Club
